Title: Relates to the adoption of a new definition of student academic success
Summary: Relates to the adoption of a new definition of student academic success and performance that includes a "character growth score" to supplement student grades and testing in kindergarten through twelfth grade.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of education to make recommendations to the board of regents relating to the adoption of a new definition of student academic success and performance that includes a "character growth score" to supplement student grades and testing in kindergarten through twelfth grade
